verses.verse: <S%H6605>Open<s%> your <S%H1817>doors,<s%> O <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> that the <S%H784>fire<s%> may <S%H398>devour<s%> your <S%H730>cedars.<s%>

<S%H3213>Howl,<s%> <S%H1265>fir<s%> tree; for the <S%H730>cedar<s%> is <S%H5307>fallen;<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> the <S%H117>mighty<s%> are <S%H7703>spoiled:<s%> <S%H3213>howl,<s%> O you <S%H437>oaks<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan;<s%> for the <S%H3293>forest<s%> of the <S%H1208>vintage<s%> is <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down.<s%>

There is a <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3213>howling<s%> of the <S%H7462>shepherds;<s%> for their <S%H155>glory<s%> is <S%H7703>spoiled:<s%> a <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H7581>roaring<s%> of <S%H3715>young<s%> <S%H3715>lions;<s%> for the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> is <S%H7703>spoiled.<s%>

<S%H834>Whose<s%> <S%H7069>possessors<s%> <S%H2026>slay<s%> them, and <S%H816>hold<s%> themselves not <S%H816>guilty:<s%> and they that <S%H4376>sell<s%> them <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> for I am <S%H6238>rich:<s%> and their own <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> <S%H2550>pity<s%> them not.

For I will <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H2550>pity<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> but, see, I will <S%H4672>deliver<s%> the <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> into his <S%H7453>neighbor's<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H4428>king:<s%> and they shall <S%H3807>smite<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> and out of their <S%H3027>hand<s%> I will not <S%H5337>deliver<s%> them.

And I will <S%H7462>feed<s%> the <S%H6629>flock<s%> of <S%H2028>slaughter,<s%> <S%H3651>even<s%> you, O <S%H6041>poor<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock.<s%> And I <S%H3947>took<s%> to me <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4731>staves;<s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> I <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H5278>Beauty,<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> I <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H2256>Bands;<s%> and I <S%H7462>fed<s%> the <S%H6629>flock.<s%>

<S%H7969>Three<s%> <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> also I <S%H3582>cut<s%> off in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3391>month;<s%> and my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H7114>loathed<s%> them, and their <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H973>abhorred<s%> me.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> I, I will not <S%H7462>feed<s%> you: that that <S%H4191>dies,<s%> let it <S%H4191>die;<s%> and that that is to be <S%H3582>cut<s%> off, let it be <S%H3582>cut<s%> off; and let the <S%H7604>rest<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H802>every<s%> <S%H802>one<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of <S%H7468>another.<s%>

And I <S%H3947>took<s%> my <S%H4731>staff,<s%> <S%H853>even<s%> <S%H5278>Beauty,<s%> and <S%H1438>cut<s%> it asunder, that I might <S%H6565>break<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I had <S%H3772>made<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And it was <S%H6565>broken<s%> in that <S%H3117>day:<s%> and <S%H3651>so<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock<s%> that <S%H8104>waited<s%> on me <S%H3045>knew<s%> that it was the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And I <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H518>If<s%> you <S%H5869>think<s%> <S%H2896>good,<s%> <S%H3051>give<s%> me my <S%H7939>price;<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> not, <S%H2308>forbear.<s%> So they <S%H8254>weighed<s%> for my <S%H7939>price<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> pieces of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H7993>Cast<s%> it to the <S%H3335>potter:<s%> a <S%H145>goodly<s%> <S%H3365>price<s%> that I was <S%H3365>priced<s%> at of them. And I <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H7970>thirty<s%> pieces of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> them to the <S%H3335>potter<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Then I <S%H1438>cut<s%> asunder my <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H4731>staff,<s%> <S%H853>even<s%> <S%H2256>Bands,<s%> that I might <S%H6565>break<s%> the <S%H264>brotherhood<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H3947>Take<s%> to you <S%H5750>yet<s%> the <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of a <S%H196>foolish<s%> <S%H7462>shepherd.<s%>

For, see, I will <S%H6965>raise<s%> up a <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> which shall not <S%H6485>visit<s%> those that be <S%H3582>cut<s%> off, <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall <S%H1245>seek<s%> the <S%H5288>young<s%> one, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7495>heal<s%> that that is <S%H7665>broken,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H3557>feed<s%> that that <S%H5324>stands<s%> still: but he shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H1277>fat,<s%> and <S%H6561>tear<s%> their <S%H6541>claws<s%> in pieces.

<S%H1945>Woe<s%> to the <S%H457>idol<s%> <S%H7473>shepherd<s%> that <S%H5800>leaves<s%> the <S%H6629>flock!<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall be on his <S%H2220>arm,<s%> and on his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H5869>eye:<s%> his <S%H2220>arm<s%> shall be <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H3001>dried<s%> up, and his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall be utterly <S%H3543>darkened.<s%>
